amendment.description: Amendment sought to expand the types of provisions in tax bills that the President can propose to be repealed under line-item veto authority to include "tax-incentives" contained in such tax bills.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 20 as printed in the Congressional Record) to expand the types of provisions in tax bills that the President can propose be repealed under line-item veto authority by permitting "tax-incentives" contained in such tax bills to be targeted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spratt amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 243 (Roll no. 89).
